titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller University records, Rockefeller University Press, Institute for Comparative Human Development (IHCD)
A Guide to the Rockefeller University records, Rockefeller University Press, Institute for Comparative Human Development (IHCD) FA955

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2015-08-27 03:42:43 -0400.

revisiondesc.item: Paper finding aid converted to EAD/XML by AureXus in 2010. Imported into the Archvistsâ€™ Toolkit by Becky Robbins.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller University records, Rockefeller University Press, Institute for Comparative Human Development (IHCD)

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements note
phystech.p: Materials requiring specialized equipment for access (film, audio, video, slides) may be closed to research dependent on availability of the applicable equipment
Brittle or damaged items, or materials otherwise in need of preservation care, may be closed to researchers at the discretion of the RAC Head of Archival Services/Head of Reference.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: William S. Hall and Michael Cole, members of the Laboratory of Comparative Human Cognition and its training counterpart, The Institute for Comparative Human Development (ICHD) started the Quarterly Newsletter in September 1976. It is published by The Rockefeller University Press.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for scholarly research.

did.unittitle: The Quarterly newsletter. New York, NY v. 1, no. 1 and later numbers.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Edited by William S. Hall and Michael Cole. Published by The Rockefeller University Press.
